faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does it take to create a website?
faq.a1: The implementation time depends on the project complexity. Usually, it takes 4-8 weeks from design approval to launch.
faq.a2: We use cutting-edge technologies like React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and more. We always choose solutions that best suit the project needs.
faq.a3: Yes, we offer various levels of support from basic to premium 24/7 support.
faq.q4: Can I expand the website later?
faq.a4: Absolutely! Our solutions are modular and can be expanded with additional features at any time.
